faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Quick answers to common questions about our services and process
faq.footer: Still have questions? We're here to help.

1.question: What should I prepare for the initial consultation?
1.answer: Bring any inspiration images, rough sketches, site photos, and a list of your requirements and budget range. We'll discuss your vision, timeline, and project scope to determine the best approach for your needs.

2.question: How long does the design process typically take?
2.answer: The timeline varies based on project complexity. Residential projects typically take 3-6 months for design development, while commercial projects may require 6-12 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during your consultation.

3.question: Do you work on projects outside of Madrid?
3.answer: Yes, we work on projects throughout Spain and internationally. For projects outside Madrid, we may schedule additional site visits and coordinate with local contractors to ensure seamless execution.

4.question: What are your fees and payment structure?
4.answer: Our fees are project-based and depend on scope, complexity, and services required. We typically structure payments in phases: initial consultation, design development, construction documentation, and construction administration. Detailed fee proposals are provided after the initial consultation.

5.question: Can you help with permits and approvals?
5.answer: Absolutely. We handle all necessary permits, zoning approvals, and regulatory compliance as part of our comprehensive service. Our team has extensive experience navigating local building codes and regulations.

6.question: Do you provide construction management services?
6.answer: Yes, we offer full construction administration services, including contractor selection, bid review, site supervision, and quality control throughout the construction phase to ensure your project is built according to design specifications.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At LCDREAM.ARQ, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website or architectural and interior design services.

collection.title: Data We Collect
collection.description: We collect information you provide directly: full name, email address, phone number, postal address (for projects), estimated budget, and details of the architectural project you wish to undertake. Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.intro: This website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. Below, we explain what cookies are, what types we use, and how you can manage them.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the site remember information about your visit, such as your preferred language and other settings, to make your next visit easier and the site more useful to you.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.description: We use different types of cookies on our site: essential cookies (necessary for site functionality), analytical cookies (to understand how the site is used), and functionality cookies (to remember your preferences such as language).

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They include session cookies, language preferences, and cookie acceptance. They cannot be disabled as they are essential for navigation.

analytics.title: Analytical Cookies
analytics.description: We use Google Analytics to collect anonymous information about how visitors use our site. This helps us improve content and user experience. These cookies collect information such as pages visited, time spent, and traffic source.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: We currently do not use marketing or targeted advertising cookies on our site. If this changes in the future, we will update this policy and request your consent.

management.title: How to Manage Cookies
management.description: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to see what cookies you have and delete them individually or block cookies from specific sites. Please note that blocking some cookies may affect site functionality.

consent.title: Your Consent
consent.description: By continuing to browse our site after seeing the cookie notice, you accept the use of cookies according to this policy. You can change your preferences at any time through your browser settings.
